title: Language Simulation Design for Adaptive Interactive Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of language structures and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Recreating real-life language use scenarios in VR environments, providing feedback tailored to individual learner progress

learning_goals: Learners can complete context-specific dialogues with over 80% accuracy in the target language within a simulated environment.
Learners can revise and apply communication strategies three or more times based on personalized feedback during VR-based task performance.
Learners can achieve Level 4 (on a 6-point scale) or higher in language proficiency during the summative assessment at the end of the course.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
